text: alis widyalaye padam mala ha anek widyalayanhi padam mala athara etharam wenasak natha.ehi samanya paridi ganithaya ha ithihasaya wani wishayayan iganwe.ehi athi ekama wenasa wanne sisun ha guruwarun sathuwa wishesha kusalatha pawathimayi.kisima sisuwekuta panthi kamaraya thuladi awasarayakin thorawa siya kusalathawa bhawitha kala nohaka.esema alis widyalaye sisunta siya kusalatha bhawitha karana ayuru igenima sandaha wenwu kusalatha padaka anshayan da thibe.mana hasirima saha shreni anuwa sisun tharu panthi paddhathiyakin beda wenkara atha.
